verses.text: Give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*; and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

My \w doctrine|strong="H3948"\w* shall \w drop|strong="H6201"\w* as the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, my \w speech|strong="H0565"\w* shall \w distil|strong="H5140"\w* as the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*, as the small \w rain|strong="H8164"\w* upon the tender \w herb|strong="H1877"\w*, and as the \w showers|strong="H7241"\w* upon the \w grass|strong="H6212"\w*:

Because I will \w publish|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w ascribe|strong="H3051"\w* ye \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w* unto our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\add He is\add* the \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w*, his \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \add is\add* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*: for all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \add are\add* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0530"\w* and without \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \w just|strong="H6662"\w* and \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \add is\add* he.

They have \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* themselves, their \w spot|strong="H3971"\w* \add is\add* not \add the spot\add* of his \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: \add they are\add* a \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w* and \w crooked|strong="H6618"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 32.5 \ft They have…: Heb. He hath corrupted to himself\f*\f + \fr 32.5 \ft their…: or, that they are not his children, that is their blot\f*

Do ye thus \w requite|strong="H1580"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and \w unwise|strong="H2450"\w*? \add is\add* not he thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add that\add* hath \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* thee? hath he not \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee, and \w established|strong="H3559"\w* thee?

¶ \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*, \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and he will \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee; thy \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, and they will \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee.\f + \fr 32.7 \ft many…: Heb. generation and generation\f*

When the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w* \w divided|strong="H5157"\w* to the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* their \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*, when he \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adam|strong="H0120"\w*, he \w set|strong="H5324"\w* the \w bounds|strong="H1367"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \add is\add* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \add is\add* the \w lot|strong="H2256"\w* of his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.\f + \fr 32.9 \ft lot: Heb. cord\f*

He \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him in a \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and in the \w waste|strong="H8414"\w* \w howling|strong="H3214"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H3452"\w*; he led him \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, he \w instructed|strong="H0995"\w* him, he \w kept|strong="H5341"\w* him as the \w apple|strong="H0380"\w* of his \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 32.10 \ft led: or, compassed\f*

As an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* stirreth \w up|strong="H5782"\w* her \w nest|strong="H7064"\w*, \w fluttereth|strong="H7363"\w* over her \w young|strong="H1469"\w*, spreadeth \w abroad|strong="H6566"\w* her \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* them, \w beareth|strong="H5375"\w* them on her \w wings|strong="H0084"\w*:

\add So\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w* did \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* him, and \add there was\add* no \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w* with him.

He made him \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* on the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, that he might \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w increase|strong="H8570"\w* of the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*; and he made him to \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* out of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* out of the \w flinty|strong="H2496"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*;

\w Butter|strong="H2529"\w* of \w kine|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* of \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, with \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, and \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w breed|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, with the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*; and thou didst \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w pure|strong="H2561"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w grape|strong="H6025"\w*.

¶ But \w Jeshurun|strong="H3484"\w* waxed \w fat|strong="H8080"\w*, and \w kicked|strong="H1163"\w*: thou art waxen \w fat|strong="H8080"\w*, thou art grown \w thick|strong="H5666"\w*, thou art \w covered|strong="H3780"\w* \add with fatness;\add* then he \w forsook|strong="H5203"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \add which\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him, and lightly \w esteemed|strong="H5034"\w* the \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* of his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
They provoked him to \w jealousy|strong="H7065"\w* with \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \add gods\add*, with \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* provoked they him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

They \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto \w devils|strong="H7700"\w*, not to \w God|strong="H0433"\w*; to \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* whom they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not, to \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \add gods that\add* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w newly|strong="H7138"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w*, whom your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w feared|strong="H8175"\w* not.\f + \fr 32.17 \ft not to…: or, which were not God\f*

Of the \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* \add that\add* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* thee thou art \w unmindful|strong="H7876"\w*, and hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w formed|strong="H2342"\w* thee.

And when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, he \w abhorred|strong="H5006"\w* \add them\add*, because of the \w provoking|strong="H3708"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and of his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 32.19 \ft abhorred: or, despised\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from them, I will \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what their \w end|strong="H0319"\w* \add shall be:\add* for they \add are\add* a very \w froward|strong="H8419"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* in whom \add is\add* no \w faith|strong="H0529"\w*.

They have moved me to \w jealousy|strong="H7065"\w* with \add that which is\add* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; they have provoked me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*: and I will move them to \w jealousy|strong="H7065"\w* with \add those which are\add* not a \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; I will provoke them to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with a \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*.

For a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* is \w kindled|strong="H6919"\w* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and shall \w burn|strong="H3344"\w* unto the \w lowest|strong="H8482"\w* \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*, and shall \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* with her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*, and set on \w fire|strong="H3857"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H4144"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 32.22 \ft shall burn: or, hath burned\f*\f + \fr 32.22 \ft shall consume: or, hath consumed\f*
I will \w heap|strong="H5595"\w* \w mischiefs|strong="H7451"\w* upon them; I will \w spend|strong="H3615"\w* mine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* upon them.

\add They shall be\add* \w burnt|strong="H4198"\w* with \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w*, and \w devoured|strong="H3898"\w* with burning \w heat|strong="H7565"\w*, and with \w bitter|strong="H4815"\w* \w destruction|strong="H6986"\w*: I will also \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* upon them, with the \w poison|strong="H2534"\w* of \w serpents|strong="H2119"\w* of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.\f + \fr 32.24 \ft heat: Heb. coals\f*

The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and \w terror|strong="H0367"\w* \w within|strong="H2315"\w*, shall \w destroy|strong="H7921"\w* both the young \w man|strong="H0970"\w* and the \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, the \w suckling|strong="H3243"\w* \add also\add* with the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of gray \w hairs|strong="H7872"\w*.\f + \fr 32.25 \ft within: Heb. from the chambers\f*\f + \fr 32.25 \ft destroy: Heb. bereave\f*

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I would scatter them into \w corners|strong="H6284"\w*, I would make the \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of them to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from among \w men|strong="H0582"\w*:

Were it \w not|strong="H3884"\w* that I \w feared|strong="H1481"\w* the \w wrath|strong="H3708"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, lest their \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w* should behave themselves \w strangely|strong="H5234"\w*, \add and\add* lest they should \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Our \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w done|strong="H6466"\w* all this.\f + \fr 32.27 \ft Our…: or, Our high hand, and not the \+nd LORD\+nd* hath done\f*
For they \add are\add* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w void|strong="H0006"\w* of \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, neither \add is there any\add* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* in them.

O \w that|strong="H3863"\w* they were \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, \add that\add* they \w understood|strong="H7919"\w* this, \add that\add* they would \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* their latter \w end|strong="H0319"\w*!

How should \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w chase|strong="H7291"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* put \w ten|strong="H7233"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* to \w flight|strong="H5127"\w*, \w except|strong="H3808"\w* their \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* had \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had shut them \w up|strong="H5462"\w*?
For their \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \add is\add* not as our \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w*, even our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* themselves \add being\add* \w judges|strong="H6414"\w*.

For their \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \add is\add* of the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* of \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, and of the \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* of \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*: their \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* \add are\add* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* of \w gall|strong="H7219"\w*, their \w clusters|strong="H0811"\w* \add are\add* \w bitter|strong="H4846"\w*:\f + \fr 32.32 \ft of the vine: or, worse than the vine\f*

Their \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \add is\add* the \w poison|strong="H2534"\w* of \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, and the \w cruel|strong="H0393"\w* \w venom|strong="H7219"\w* of \w asps|strong="H6620"\w*.
\add Is\add* not this laid up in \w store|strong="H3647"\w* with me, \add and\add* sealed \w up|strong="H2856"\w* among my \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*?

To me \add belongeth\add* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, and \w recompence|strong="H8005"\w*; their \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* shall \w slide|strong="H4131"\w* in \add due\add* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*: for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of their \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* \add is\add* at \w hand|strong="H7138"\w*, and the things that shall \w come|strong="H6264"\w* upon them make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* himself for his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, when he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* that \add their\add* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* is \w gone|strong="H0235"\w*, and \add there is\add* \w none|strong="H0657"\w* shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w*, or \w left|strong="H5800"\w*.\f + \fr 32.36 \ft power: Heb. hand\f*
And he shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Where \add are\add* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \add their\add* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* in whom they \w trusted|strong="H2620"\w*,

Which did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, \add and\add* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* of their drink \w offerings|strong="H5257"\w*? let them rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w help|strong="H5826"\w* you, \add and\add* be your \w protection|strong="H5643"\w*.\f + \fr 32.38 \ft your…: Heb. an hiding for you\f*

\w See|strong="H7200"\w* now that I, \add even\add* I, \add am\add* he, and \add there is\add* no \w god|strong="H0430"\w* with me: I \w kill|strong="H4191"\w*, and I make \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*; I \w wound|strong="H4272"\w*, and I \w heal|strong="H7495"\w*: neither \add is there any\add* that can \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* out of my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
For I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w live|strong="H2416"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

If I \w whet|strong="H8150"\w* my \w glittering|strong="H1300"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* take \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* on \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; I will \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* to mine \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*, and will \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me.

I will make mine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; \add and that\add* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* and of the \w captives|strong="H7633"\w*, from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* of \w revenges|strong="H6546"\w* upon the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*, O ye \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \add with\add* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for he will \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and will \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* to his \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, and will be \w merciful|strong="H3722"\w* unto his \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \add and\add* to his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 32.43 \ft Rejoice…: or, Praise his people, ye nations: or, Sing ye\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he, and \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.\f + \fr 32.44 \ft Hoshea: or, Joshua\f*
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* to all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Set|strong="H7760"\w* your \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* unto all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which I \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* among you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, which ye shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* to \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

For it \add is\add* not a \w vain|strong="H7386"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* for you; because it \add is\add* your \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: and through this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* ye shall \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add your\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, whither ye go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* that \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w Abarim|strong="H5682"\w*, \add unto\add* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, that \add is\add* over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*; and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*:

And \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* whither thou goest \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; as \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*, and was \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

Because ye \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against me \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* at the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Meribah-Kadesh|strong="H4808"\w*, in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*; because ye \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* me not in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 32.51 \ft Meribah-Kadesh: or, strife at Kadesh\f*

Yet thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* before \add thee;\add* but thou shalt not \w go|strong="H0935"\w* thither unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
